title: Maryland, Georgia Pause Gas Taxes With Prices Near Record Highs
sub_head: Other states, including New York, also weighing whether to suspend taxes on gasoline; California is considering $400 rebates
body:
Lawmakers across the U.S. are pushing to pause the collection of gasoline taxes to give drivers a temporary break at the pump as fuel costs hover near record highs.
Maryland and Georgia are temporarily cutting state gasoline taxes as fuel prices have surged world-wide amid Russiaâ€™s invasion of Ukraine, which sent shock waves throughout the oil market. California is considering giving drivers a $400 rebate to help cushion the blow of high gasoline prices.
